TopicTitle: Revolution: A Sequel to "What if there was a war for the Kerbol System?"

Articles.Content:
Introduction:

Eve, Kerbo-Laythe, and Jool have always disliked each other. War was inevitable, and it began, but never ended. Eventually, an alien race, from a planet they named "Earth" came and promised order, peace. Sick liars, they were. They kidnapped our people, did tests on them. We shall not tolerate this, for we, are Eve, with technology so advanced, it will never be replicated anywhere else on the universe until our sun explodes. For we, are Jool, with hearts so metallic, they will never be penetrated by even an explosive bullet. For we, are Kerbin & Laythe, with rage so induced, they shall see steam in our eyes. And we call, for unity! We will take it all back!

Factions:

Jool, Eve, and Kerbo-Laythe are allied, against Earth

Jool

  • Difficulty of winning a Battle: Easy
  • Difficulty of traveling within own system: Medium
  • Difficulty of traveling to other systems: Incapable

Eve

  • Difficulty of winning a Battle: Difficult
  • Difficulty of traveling within own system: Taking candy from a sleeping baby is harder
  • Difficulty of traveling to other systems: Medium

Kerbo-Laythe

  • Difficulty of winning a Battle: Medium
  • Difficulty of traveling within own system: Easy
  • Difficulty of traveling to other systems: Difficult

Earth

  • Difficulty of winning a battle: In between Easy and Medium
  • Difficulty of traveling within own system: Easy
  • Difficulty of traveling to other systems: Medium

Just like the previous, you get to write about it, as long as it doesn't go too far from the current plotline.

Mohole Attacked

A group of Evian rebels have sent troops to the Mohole, a hole within Moho's North Pole. The Mohole is a huge, valuable mine, consisting of huge pockets of Kethane. If the Mohole is taken by the rebels, then the Union of Earth will have a large amount of their income lost. Of course, due to the value of the Mohole, the hole is one of the most well-defended outposts in the Kerbol system.

A group of Evian rebels have sent troops to the Mohole, a hole within Moho's North Pole. The Mohole is a huge, valuable mine, consisting of huge pockets of Kethane. If the Mohole is taken by the rebels, then the Union of Earth will have a large amount of their income lost. Of course, due to the value of the Mohole, the hole is one of the most well-defended outposts in the Kerbol system.

I'm sorry, but I believe that this must be said...

Giggity.
Such a shame the humans are evil.
You know how we are in the movies. evil, evil, experimenting, demented, evil. we probably have kerbals taken for experiments, wouldn't we.

United Planets of Kerbol

The goverments of kerbol have comed to an a agreement to fight the earthlings and unify the system as one nation.

Jool as the militaristic leaders

Eve as the reasearch and travel leaders

And Kerbin the economic and politic center of Kerbol.

I'm sorry, but I believe that this must be said...

Giggity.

LOL! That's priceless:D

Aaahhh you did a sequel thanks! Meanwhile in the U.M.P extremists have been plotting with the humans to stop the rest of the Kerbals though force and have rallied the citizens of the glorious Munar Union to war against the other Kerbals! Unfortunately there are no links in this emergency copy of Munar Mag.
